subject: Re: [junit] Re: Can't access junit.org site|!
msgSnippet: ... 1) Download JUnit (http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=15278) 2) unzip the zip file (http://www.winzip.com/) 3) look into the docs
messageBody:
> Because i can't connect "getting started". Do you have any
> documentation for beginner of junit?


As I said:


>>The "getting started" documentation is also included in the
>> download zip file


1) Download JUnit
(http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=15278)
2) unzip the zip file (http://www.winzip.com/)
3) look into the docs directory

Additionally, use google (http://www.google.com) and search for "junit
guide"
(http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=junit+guide&btnG=Google+Search).
But you can also search for "comprehensive junit guide"
(http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=comprehensive+junit+guide&btnG=Google+Search)
and the first result is JUnit Primer
(http://www.clarkware.com/articles/JUnitPrimer.html).

-Vladimir

--
Vladimir Bossicard
www.bossicard.com
